channel.title: RuneShadows | 2006 Remake | 474 Items | 24/7 |
channel.description:
[CENTER] [B][SIZE=5][COLOR="#00FF00"]As the server is new, we are currently looking for active and friendly players to become moderators![/COLOR][/SIZE][/B]
[B][SIZE=5][U]Intro:[/U][/SIZE][/B]
[I][B][SIZE=3]Note: We are new, and trying to create a player base. Bear with us. All new players for a limited time will receive an item.. if you know I mean ;)[/SIZE][/B][/I]
[I][COLOR="#008000"][B]My name is Nic and I am the owner of RuneShadows.
RuneShadows is a 2006 based RuneScape Private Server where we aim to capture the nostalgia of players. We stride to make RuneShadows feel like RuneScape did years ago.
However, we have made a big change to our game that most other remakes have not. As a team we have decided to change the experience (XP) rate to a much higher degree. This will give the players the same old school feel but a much easier training environment.
While doing this may increase the speed of gameplay, it will also help start a fast economy and bring a large player base. Which can lead to player killing and clans, thus making a quicker and high paced game.
We hope you enjoy RuneShadows, and don't forget to stay active on the forums and get involved in community events![/B][/COLOR][/I]
[B][U][SIZE=5][COLOR="#B22222"]Links:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/U][/B]
[B]Website: [url=http://www.rune-shadows.com]www.rune-shadows.com[/url] Webclient: [url=http://www.rune-shadows.com/play]www.rune-shadows.com/play[/url] Forums: [url=http://www.rune-shadows.com/forums]www.rune-shadows.com/forums[/url] Downloadable Client: [URL=http://"www.rune-shadows.com/play/client.jar"]www.rune-shadows.com/play/client.jar[/URL] [/B]
[B][U][SIZE=5][COLOR="#0000CD"][FONT=Comic Sans MS]Features:[/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE][/U][/B] * All skills work except Farming and Agility * Barrows minigame flawless * Starter shops at home * High xp rate * Temporary veteran item * Friendly staff * Commands in-game that assist teleporting as well as the spellbook * Full ancients * Perfect pking and switches * Old-school feel * Lots more..
[B][U][SIZE=5][COLOR="#0000CD"][FONT=Comic Sans MS]Pictures:[/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE][/U][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/v2t9PZI.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4B4cH6W.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Wnoium4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qiRqwwT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/IpcBmXS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/szuO2vw.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ONNJjzM.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/K8AFa2l.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/L9C8DQT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QaOi4Ou.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/A2Db7Rz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/eQYVo6u.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/H5Z7wFz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OAYUuI5.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SFWu0vB.png[/img] [/CENTER]

@Flame3 wrote:

Unless someone provides proof of this server having a virus, this thread will be kept open.
Until then, I advise everyone to be wary when playing this server.

item.title: RuneShadows | 2006 Remake | 474 Items | 24/7 |
item.dc:creator: @EvenoRS EvenoRS
item.description:
@EvenoRS wrote:

[CENTER]
[SIZE=5][COLOR="#00FF00"]As the server is new, we are currently looking for active and friendly players to become moderators![/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=5]Intro:[/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]Note: We are new, and trying to create a player base. Bear with us. All new players for a limited time will receive an item… if you know I mean ;)[/SIZE]

[I][COLOR="#008000"][B]My name is Nic and I am the owner of RuneShadows.

RuneShadows is a 2006 based RuneScape Private Server where we aim to capture the nostalgia of players. We stride to make RuneShadows feel like RuneScape did years ago.

However, we have made a big change to our game that most other remakes have not. As a team we have decided to change the experience (XP) rate to a much higher degree. This will give the players the same old school feel but a much easier training environment.

While doing this may increase the speed of gameplay, it will also help start a fast economy and bring a large player base. Which can lead to player killing and clans, thus making a quicker and high paced game.

We hope you enjoy RuneShadows, and don’t forget to stay active on the forums and get involved in community events![/B][/COLOR][/I]

[SIZE=5][COLOR="#B22222"]Links:[/COLOR][/SIZE]

Website: www.rune-shadows.com
Webclient: www.rune-shadows.com/play
Forums: www.rune-shadows.com/forums
Downloadable Client: www.rune-shadows.com/play/client.jar

[SIZE=5][COLOR="#0000CD"][FONT=Comic Sans MS]Features:[/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE]

  • All skills work except Farming and Agility
  • Barrows minigame flawless
  • Starter shops at home
  • High xp rate
  • Temporary veteran item
  • Friendly staff
  • Commands in-game that assist teleporting as well as the spellbook
  • Full ancients
  • Perfect pking and switches
  • Old-school feel
  • Lots more…
